expo.name: Recsac
expo.description: Recsac is a new inbox experience for receiving use-and-throw, short lived email messages to your phone number, without using your personal email ids.  For example, online purchases, store receipts, temporary web logins, software downloads, quick online reads etc - for anything you could think of.  These use-and-throw messages will be auto deleted after a scheduled expiry date.  Try recsac today.  Keep your personal email ids safe and use for what it's supposed to be!
